name: avalonbox
description: A simple lightbox solution in vanilla JS.

scripts.deploy:site: npm run pages:build && npm run pages:min && npm run pages:push && npm run pages:clean
scripts.pages:min: npm run pages:min:index | npm run pages:min:demo
scripts.pages:min:index: usemin pages/index.html --dest pages -o pages/index.html --htmlmin true --rmlr true
scripts.pages:min:demo: usemin pages/demo.html --dest pages -o pages/demo.html --htmlmin true --rmlr true
scripts.pages:build: npm run build:css | npm run pages:build:js | npm run pages:build:pug
scripts.pages:watch: npm run pages:watch:css | npm run pages:watch:js
scripts.pages:serve: npm run pages:watch | npm run pages:sync | npm run watch:css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.prepublish: npm run build:js && npm run build:css

author: nefla
